key.name: enable-wifi
key.description: If set, Wi-Fi will be automatically turned on when airplane mode is disabled.

key.name: enable-bluetooth
key.description: If set, Bluetooth will be automatically turned on when airplane mode is disabled.

key.name: enable-airplane-mode
key.description: If set, airplane mode will be automatically turned on when Wi-Fi is disabled.

key.name: enable-debug-log
key.description: If enabled, the extension will log some things for debugging purposes.

key.name: disable-radio-interval
key.description: How much time should elapse between each try disabling a radio.

key.name: max-interval-count
key.description: How often maximally it should be tried to disable a radio.
